actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to provide that food products shall not be exempt from guidelines issued which limit increases of the levels of prices.

summary.text: Provides, under the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, that food products shall not be exempt from guidelines issued which limit increases of the levels of prices.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to provide that food products shall not be exempt from guidelines issued which limit increases of the levels of prices.
